dt-option.name: keys.focus
dt-option.summary: Cell to receive initial focus in the table

type.description: The cell that will receive focus when the table is initialised. This accepts all of the options of `dt-type cell-selector` such as class name selector, jQuery pseudo selects and cell index selectors.

dt-option.default: The table will not automatically receive focus when initialised
dt-option.description:
This option can be used to define what cell in the table (if any) will automatically receive focus when the table is initialised with KeyTable enabled.
The value of this option will be over-ridden if state saving is enabled in DataTables (`dt-init stateSave`) and there is a saved focused cell - i.e. the state saved focused cell will instead receive the focus.

example.title: Automatically focus on the first cell in the table
